ndarray/tables/detail/FieldInfo.hpp

00001 #ifndef NDARRAY_TABLES_DETAIL_FieldInfo_hpp_INCLUDED
00002 #define NDARRAY_TABLES_DETAIL_FieldInfo_hpp_INCLUDED
00003 
00004 #include "ndarray/tables_fwd.hpp"
00005 
00006 namespace ndarray { namespace tables { namespace detail {
00007 
00008 template <typename Field>
00009 struct FieldInfo {};
00010 
00011 template <typename T, int N>
00012 struct FieldInfo< Field<T,N> > {
00013     typedef typename boost::mpl::int_<N>::type ND;
00014     
00015     typedef Field<T,N> Field_;
00016 
00017     typedef typename boost::mpl::bool_<(N==0)>::type IsScalar;
00018 
00019     typedef ndarray::Array<T,N+1,N> ColumnValue;
00020 
00021     template <bool isConst>
00022     struct Qualified {
00023         typedef typename boost::mpl::if_c<isConst, T const, T>::type Element;
00024         typedef typename boost::mpl::if_<IsScalar, Element &, ndarray::ArrayRef<Element,N,N> >::type RowValue;
00025         typedef ndarray::ArrayRef<Element,N+1,N> TableValue;
00026     };
00027 
00028 };
00029 
00030 template <typename T, int N>
00031 struct FieldInfo< Field<T,N> & > : public FieldInfo< Field<T,N> > {};
00032 
00033 template <typename T, int N>
00034 struct FieldInfo< Field<T,N> const & > : public FieldInfo< Field<T,N> > {};
00035 
00036 }}} // namespace ndarray::tables::detail
00037 
00038 #endif // !NDARRAY_TABLES_DETAIL_FieldInfo_hpp_INCLUDED
